summary:
HDMI (High-Definition Multimedia Interface) is a technology that lets you connect devices like computers, game consoles, and Blu-ray players to displays like TVs and monitors. It sends high-quality video and audio signals without compression, ensuring a clear picture and sound. HDMI has replaced older analog connections like VGA and DVI.

Over time, HDMI has improved, offering better resolution, 3D support, and even an Ethernet connection. It's now a common feature on TVs, cameras, and many other electronic devices, with billions sold worldwide.
title: HDMI
